response.overview: After half a decade of persistent research and an exhaustive series of investigations, Steve Shippy and his team believed they had finally rid the Brockway home of the sinister presence that had tormented the Braley family. The atmosphere had shifted, the energy had calmed, and for the first time in years, peace seemed to settle over the historic Saginaw residence. Nearly a year passed in quiet reprieve — life was seemingly getting back to normal.  That tranquility was shattered when a frantic late-night 911 call was made from the manor. The activity had not only returned, but had grown darker, more intelligent, and dangerously aware. As the line between the living and the dead once again began to blur, the team uncovered new, unsettling evidence that the haunting had never truly ended — it had only been waiting to strike again.
response.title: A Haunting on Brockway Street 3
